LanguageData.MealSurvivalPack.label: packaged survival meal
LanguageData.MealSurvivalPack.description: A high-quality packaged meal, manufactured for use in survival situations.
LanguageData.MealNutrientPaste.label: nutrient paste meal
LanguageData.MealNutrientPaste.description: A synthetic mixture of protein, carbohydrates, and vitamins, amino acids and minerals. Everything the body needs, and absolutely disgusting.
LanguageData.MealSimple.label: simple meal
LanguageData.MealSimple.description: A simple meal quickly cooked from a few ingredients.
LanguageData.MealFine.label: fine meal
LanguageData.MealFine.description: A complex dish assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients.
LanguageData.MealLavish.label: lavish meal
LanguageData.MealLavish.description: A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this meal nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
